about_the_game:
🏃‍♀️ Be the fastest in Sprint Racers! Run to move forward, jump across the hedges and duck to dodge obstacles.

Features:

📷 Motion recognition using your phone's camera, without any other sensors or controllers.

🏆 Online leaderboard.

⚙️ Multiple game modes (full body, upper body) making it accessible to all player profiles.

Sporty Peppers, winner of the Grande Cause Nationale 2024 call for projects by the French Ministry of Sports, Youth and the Voluntary Sector, is now flying the flag for the Grande Cause of physical activity and sport!

Notes:

While we are continually working to make the Sporty Peppers experience optimal for everyone, some devices may still experience compatibility or optimization issues. If you think that the Sporty Peppers game is not working properly on your device, let us know about your experience via our contact form, we will be happy to answer you!
